201902.n: Succession & Transfer of Power in Family Business

catList: Majority of companies in economy are Family Businesses. However, current estimates hint that only 13% of family businesses can continue their operation at third generation, mostly due to problems experienced during Succession & Transfer of Power. Making a successful take-off for next generation is critical in sustainability of family businesses. The goal of this course is to examine the elements of Succession & Transfer of Power in Family Business environment. Also, after taking charge; next generation members are generally having a challenge of re-energizing entrepreneurial spirit of company. Issues related with entrepreneurship will be discussed. There will be guests from family businesses to support class discussions with the kind help of TAIDER.
